#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
    int t,n,a,k,sum;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        sum=0;
        k=1;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        while(n>0)
        {
            a=n%2;
            sum=sum+a*pow(5,k++);
            n=n/2;
        }
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
}
